Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Personal Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A single-occupant shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight. Unlike larger shuttles, this model runs on chemfuel and cannot be upgraded.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Personal Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A single-occupant shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight. Unlike larger shuttles, this model runs on chemfuel and cannot be upgraded.

Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features one hardpoint for a turret.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features one hardpoint for a turret.

Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Heavy Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A large shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features two hardpoints for turrets.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Heavy Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A large shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features two hardpoints for turrets.

Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Superheavy Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A very large shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features three hardpoints for turrets.

Vehicles.VehicleDef.label: Superheavy Shuttle
Vehicles.VehicleDef.description: A very large shuttlecraft capable of both orbital and suborbital flight, powered by uranium fuel pods. Due to its size, it requires special docking facilities.\n\nBecause the design is based on miniaturized ship components, this shuttle can be upgraded once the appropriate technologies have been researched. Most upgrades cost cargo space to install. This shuttle features three hardpoints for turrets.

Vehicles.VehicleStatDef.label: Space Dodge Chance
Vehicles.VehicleStatDef.description: This vehicle's chance of dodging enemy fire during space combat.

Vehicles.VehicleStatDef.label: hardpoints
Vehicles.VehicleStatDef.description: How many hardpoints this shuttle has.
